import React, {Component} from "react"; import {Helmet} from "react-helmet"; import {connect} from "react-redux"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import Breadcrumb from "../breadcrumb"; import {getCartTotal} from "../../services"; import {removeFromCart, incrementQty, decrementQty} from "../../actions/indexO"; class cartComponent extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {}; } render() { const {cartItems, symbol, total} = this.props; return (
{/*SEO Support*/} MultiKart | Cart List Page {/*SEO Support End */} {cartItems.length > 0 ? (
{cartItems.map((item, index) => { return ( ); })}
image product name price quantity action total
{item.name}

{symbol} {item.price}

this.props.removeFromCart(item) } >

{symbol} {item.price}

{item.qty >= item.stock ? "out of Stock" : ""} 		this.props.removeFromCart(item)} >

{symbol} {item.sum}

total price :

{symbol} {total}{" "}

continue shopping
check out
) : (

Your Cart is Empty

Explore more shortlist some items.

)}
); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ cartItems: state.cartList.cart, symbol: state.data.symbol, total: getCartTotal(state.cartList.cart), }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, { removeFromCart, incrementQty, decrementQty, })(cartComponent);
